WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is already working except it has a bug in current 2.2.24 release. As a workaround after you change filters to desired either close/restart Rawr or change model/race temporarily.
WorkItem.Description: Support the use of Filters in the "Build Upgrade List" features.  As some of the models become more complex, the time wasted in evaluating the upgrade potential of various greens, blues and pre-WotLK epics can be very significant.  A simple ilvl/quality check would be great - using the current editable display filters would be excellent.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Optimizer.UL] Filters for Build Upgrade List
